{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3442847,"name":"Super SCREAM Bros","username":"SCREAM14204","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/scream14204/{size}/235848_2.png","created_at":"2024-11-01T23:44:38.287Z","cooked":"

Has anyone been able to purchase a Servo Module from REV. I’ve seen a couple threads asking about them but no evidence of any actually sold. Also not finding any technical documentation on their website lends to the suspicion that it has not been available for purchase yet.

To be clear I’m talking about the Servo Hub

Not the Servo Power Module

Since it was just announced legal for 2025 as a new product, it probably hasn’t been sold to anyone yet.

It’s been announced longer than that. FTC starts in early September…

Peter_Johnson:

Since it was just announced legal for 2025 as a new product, it probably hasn’t been sold to anyone yet.

REV’s own product release thread states “We expect that these will be available in middle to late October”

Given it’s now November and we haven’t seen or heard anything (nor has it even shown up on REV’s own stock updates page), I think it’s safe to assume there were some delays with the release.
